textos_fuente.text: Real Estate Resources - Eagle Creek Golf and CC Skip to main content Home The Club Golf Golf Membership Membership & Real Estate Golf Equity Membership Social Membership Real Estate Real Estate Information Properties for Sale Properties for Rent For Owners - List Your Rental Real Estate Resources Contact Employment Naples Legacy Reimagined Login Loading ... × Click to Search Member Login MENU Home The Club Golf Golf Membership Membership & Real Estate Golf Equity Membership Social Membership Real Estate Real Estate Information Properties for Sale Properties for Rent For Owners - List Your Rental Real Estate Resources Contact Employment Naples Legacy Reimagined Login In This Section ▾ Real Estate Information Properties for Sale Properties for Rent For Owners - List Your Rental Real Estate Resources Real Estate Resources Welcome to Eagle Creek for Realtors, a page designed to provide realtors and prospective members with the need-to-know information about Eagle Creek. Welcome home. You’ve arrived at one of Naples’ most coveted enclaves, Eagle Creek. Where natural beauty and membership have harmonized for 40 years on over 300 acres. Our small village setting lends itself to cultivating friendships, lasting a lifetime. Developed in the 1980’s, thoughtful consideration was given to creating a low-density community, perfecting the balance of real estate nestled within an artfully created golf course by Larry Packard. As a resident, you can select from one of 461 residents offering Condominiums with the largest lanais in Naples, Carriage Home Villas with detached guest suites, and well-appointed Estate Homes featuring panoramic golf-course views. Floorplans excel with spacious, open and brightly lit layouts. Available in 1,2 and 3 bedroom configurations, you'll find the perfect residence to accommodate your desires. Built when attention to detail was an envied skill, our residences are now enjoying a renovation revival that deserves a closer look. Carefully crafted and beautifully designed when home building was more an art than commerce, our top-drawer renovations, such as chef-inspired kitchens and spa-like bathrooms, challenge many new communities in both comfort and luxury. We invite you to make the comparisons with other communities and you'll easily choose Eagle Creek over others. Property Listings View Property Listings Rentals View Rentals Listing & Sales Tools Suggestions for Showing Eagle Creek: While all realtors are skilled in the art of showing properties, there is much more beyond the luxury residences. To help plan your community tour, highlighting our state-of-the-art amenities, the following should serve as your guide: Standardized Boilerplate Content for Listings: Please copy and paste the following for your listing description: " Welcome home. You’ve arrived at one of Naples’ most coveted enclaves, Eagle Creek. Where natural beauty and membership have harmonized for 40 years on over 300 acres. Our small village setting lends itself to cultivating friendships, lasting a lifetime. Developed in the 1980’s, thoughtful consideration was given to creating a low-density community, perfecting the balance of real estate nestled within an artfully created golf course by Larry Packard. As a resident, you can select from one of 461 residents offering Condominiums with the largest lanais in Naples, Carriage Home Villas with detached guest suites, and well-appointed Estate Homes featuring panoramic golf-course views. Floorplans excel with spacious, open and brightly lit layouts. Available in 1,2 and 3 bedroom configurations, you'll find the perfect residence to accommodate your desires. Built when attention to detail was an envied skill, our residences are now enjoying a renovation revival that deserves a closer look. Carefully crafted and beautifully designed when home building was more an art than commerce, our top-drawer renovations, such as chef-inspired kitchens and spa-like bathrooms, challenge many new communities in both comfort and luxury. We invite you to make the comparisons with other communities and you'll easily choose Eagle Creek over others. For information regarding membership fees, equity and club amenities, please contact the Membership Director at Marketing@eaglecreekcc.org or (239) 793-0500. Community Signage Guidelines: " For Sale" signs, "For Rent" signs, or other window displays, signs or advertising are not permitted on any part of the Common Areas or in any Living Unit or on any Parcel such that they are visible from the Common Areas, including signs in or on vehicles parked on a Lot. Notwithstanding this restriction, an Owner may display one (1) tan and green "Open House" sign, that can be purchased from the NABOR Store, upon their Lot so long as such sign is not displayed for more than two (2) consecutive days in any seven (7) day period. Pickleball at Eagle Creek Eagle Creek is featured in an article with Club & Resort Business about... Community Wide Open House Eagle Creek Golf & Country Club                    Community Wide Open House   _______... Featured in Club & Resort Business __________________________________________    "We are thrilled to... Golf Equity Membership Enjoy an active golf lifestyle that embraces the camaraderie and traditions of the game on our Larry Packard design, featuring his double dog-leg par 5s. U.S. Open winner Ken Venturi enjoyed Eagle Creek and so can you. With a soft cap of 365 golfing members, Eagle Creek is one of the few courses in Naples you can walk at any time. Magnificently reimagined by notable, local architect Gordon Lewis in 2021, you’ll soon discover why we are Naples’ best kept secret. The goal for the number of golf membership is 365 ensuring that members have access to the golf course as often as they wish. Click HERE to view a hole-by-hole video of our Golf Course For fee information, please contact: Membership & Communications Director 239-793-0500 Communications@EagleCreekCC.org Enjoy membership at Eagle Creek Golf & Country Club, where we offer condos, estate homes, villas and beautiful courtyard pool homes! Social Equity Membership Our “right sized” intimate community encourages closer friendships and sporting partners with no compromise in amenities and activities featured in larger clubs. At Eagle Creek you also have the programs, equipment and professional instruction and encouragement to embrace a healthier lifestyle. Featuring fitness classes in-season, full gym, 5-har-tru tennis courts, 2-har-tru pickleball courts, 3 grass bocce courts, active social calendar, poolside cafe and more! Social Members enjoy year-round privileges of the golf practice facilities and out of season golf privileges, May 1-November 30th. Membership is required when purchasing a property at Eagle Creek. For fee information, please contact: Membership & Communications Director 239-793-0500 Communications@EagleCreekCC.or g Click HERE to view hole-by-hole tour of our golf course Rental Information To browse available rental properties, please click HERE. Golf Rental Memberships - $2,000 + tax per month single / $2,600 + tax per month couple (Available from Golf Equity Properties Only) Social Rental Membership is available - $1,000+ tax per month. (Available for all Properties) Limited Golf Rental Membership - $1,000+ tax per month. (Available from Golf-In-Waiting Properties Only) To verify the membership status of a rental property, you may contact the owner or communications@eaglecreekcc.org For more information about rentals, please contact the Membership & Communications Director at (239)793-0500 ext. 112 or Communications@eaglecreekcc.org . We kindly request the necessary documents be submitted at least forty five(45) days prior to the rental start date. _____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ To browse available rental properties, please click HERE. 2025-2026 Rental Membership Program Guide **Please contact the Communications Director for Rental Applications** _________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ facebook twitter instagram youtube Contact us for more information Eagle Creek Golf & Country Club 11 Cypress View Drive Naples, FL 34113 239-793-0500 Membership / Real Estate 239-774-2202 Eagle Creek Golf Pro Shop MEMBERSHIP Membership & Real Estate Golf Equity Membership Social Membership Naples’ best private golf and country club © Eagle Creek Golf and CC. All Rights Reserved.

Rentals - Eagle Creek Golf and CC Skip to main content Home The Club Golf Golf Membership Membership & Real Estate Golf Equity Membership Social Membership Real Estate Real Estate Information Properties for Sale Properties for Rent For Owners - List Your Rental Real Estate Resources Contact Employment Naples Legacy Reimagined Login Loading ... × Click to Search Member Login MENU Home The Club Golf Golf Membership Membership & Real Estate Golf Equity Membership Social Membership Real Estate Real Estate Information Properties for Sale Properties for Rent For Owners - List Your Rental Real Estate Resources Contact Employment Naples Legacy Reimagined Login In This Section ▾ Membership & Real Estate Golf Equity Membership Social Membership Rentals We love to see people from around the world calling our beautiful club "home", even if only for a few months. The Renter Membership Program provides individuals and families the opportunity to experience Eagle Creek's award-winning amenities, facilities and everyday life in Southwest Florida. For 40 years, Eagle Creek has delivered unforgettable hospitality to members, renters and their guests. We welcome you to be our guest in paradise. Following your selection of either a Social or Golf Rental Membership, Eagle Creek's Rental Membership Program requires completion and approval of Eagle Creek Community Association Lease Application, Club Rental Application, a copy of each applicants driver's license, and $100 Non-Refundable Application Fee. Please note: Golf Rental Memberships are only available when renting a property with a Golf Equity Membership for $1,850+tax per month. Limited Golf Rental Membership from a Golf-In-Waiting Program participant is available for $750+ tax per month. To verify the membership status of a rental property, you may contact the owner or communications@eaglecreekcc.org For more information, please contact Cassie Jo Caraway at (239)793-0500 ext. 112 or Communications@eaglecreekcc.org . We kindly request the necessary documents be submitted at least forty five(45) days prior to the rental start date. ________________________________________________ To browse available rental properties, please click HERE. 2023-2024 Rental Membership Program Guide 2023-2024 Rental Membership Applications ________________________________________________ Rules & Regulations: Club Rules & Regulations VIEW RENTALS facebook twitter instagram youtube Contact us for more information Eagle Creek Golf & Country Club 11 Cypress View Drive Naples, FL 34113 239-793-0500 Membership / Real Estate 239-774-2202 Eagle Creek Golf Pro Shop MEMBERSHIP Membership & Real Estate Golf Equity Membership Social Membership Naples’ best private golf and country club © Eagle Creek Golf and CC. All Rights Reserved.

Event Calendar Book A Tee Time Golf Coaching Scroll Down for More Course Tour Take a virtual tour and book your next round of golf online. It’s fast and easy! Course Tour Golf Events Golf Events From small golf outings to large corporate tournaments, the Eagle Creek professional staff is here to make your event a great success! Learn More Weddings + Events Wedding & Events Our experienced staff will make your special event a success. Learn More Here at Eagle Creek Golf Club Conveniently located minutes from the Orlando International Airport , Eagle Creek Golf Club Orlando was designed by world-renowned golf course architects Ron Garl and Howard Swan. It is an extraordinary 18-hole, 7200-yard, Par 73 championship course with five sets of tees for golfers of all skill levels and more than 60 bunkers and dramatic bulkheads are reminiscent of those found in Scotland and England. Overall, the true Scottish-style experience of Eagle Creek Golf Club stands out from other Orlando championship golf courses as a true golfing masterpiece! Enjoy our unique Orlando Golf Club features like the spectacular 14,000 square foot, two-story clubhouse designed in a vintage, New England-manor style, which includes a fully stocked pro shop, the Belfry Restaurant – a 120-seat restaurant with private wedding and banquet space available, plus locker rooms and showers for men and women. Whichever your occasion may be, we invite you to join us sometime soon for an exceptionally memorable experience at one of Central Florida’s finest signature golf clubs. Footer Visit Us Eagle Creek Golf Club 10350 Emerson Lake Blvd Orlando, FL 32832 Hours of Operation Hours based on day light hours. For the most up to date information please call our Pro Shop. They are assigned to help guide, equip, and empower the pastors and staff at Journey Church to fulfill the mission and vision that God has uniquely given us. Our current Leadership Board members: Megan O’Connell, Jon Burgi, Lacey McNay, Ed Hatch, Amy Schlapper, Josh Thoreson. About us - Argyle Country Club Skip to content About Us Golf Menu Toggle Course Elite Golfers Instruction & Tournaments Racquet Sports Membership Events Amenities Contact Us Log In Log In Main Menu About Us Golf Menu Toggle Course Elite Golfers Instruction & Tournaments Racquet Sports Membership Events Amenities Contact Us Log In Log In Our Club Welcome to Argyle – a private club with the warmth of your local pub, the joy of being outdoors, and the enjoyment of a great round of golf, all in one place. Mission & Vision Our Mission Deliver an excellent club experience and championship caliber golf to member families and their guests at an unparalleled value. Our Vision A distinctly approachable club where everyone feels welcome. Club Values Integrity & Respect We value honesty, transparency, and fairness, treating every member with respect while upholding club traditions and rules. Quality We are committed to doing things the right way, ensuring fiscal responsibility, strong governance, and well-maintained facilities. Community We foster an inclusive, welcoming environment where members support one another, engage in club activities, and help strengthen our club’s future. A History of Golf and Community Argyle Country Club was founded on the belief that golf should be welcoming, accessible, and family-friendly—a place where working families could build a community and enjoy the game without the formality of a traditional country club. Founded in 1923, Argyle started as a small club in Washington, DC, before relocating to Sligo Creek Golf Course in Silver Spring, Maryland. In 1945, Argyle moved again to its current 150-acre property, which was originally a working dairy farm. The old barn was converted into a clubhouse, and members came together to help shape the course and facilities. Through the years, Argyle has expanded and improved while staying true to its roots—a club where championship golf and genuine camaraderie come first. Today, with over 500 member families, Argyle remains a welcoming, family-friendly community with a passion for the game. Meet the Argyle Team Behind every exceptional club is a dedicated team of professionals who bring passion, experience, and a commitment to excellence. At Argyle, our leadership ensures that every round of golf, tennis match, and club gathering is an experience to remember. Kevin Taylor Head Golf Professional​ Cory Wesselman Director of Greens & Grounds Karen Lawson Director of Clubhouse Operations Charlie Petrusky Director of Racquet Sports Lindsay Kelly Director of Membership & Marketing Frank Malits President Kathy Ackley Director of Catering & Special Events Join the Argyle Community Explore Membership Options About Us Golf Membership Events Contact Us About Us Golf Membership Events Contact Us Address 14600 Argyle Club Rd, Silver Spring, Maryland 20906 Phone +1 301-598-5500 Copyright © 2025 Privacy Policy

Weddings & Events Eagle Glen Bar & Grille Pickleball Book a Tee Time Book Sim Lounge Weddings & Events Pickleball Book a Tee Time Book Sim Lounge Eagle Glen Bar & Grille Eagle Glen Golf Club is home to many charities and corporate events year after year. Our exceptional golf course, committed team, and top-tier Food & Beverage services collaborate flawlessly to deliver a premium golfing experience for you and your party. From initial arrangements to the last stroke on the 18th hole, every element of your visit is managed with precision and thoughtfulness. We’re also excited to welcome you to Eagle Glen’s Players Club, where members gain access to exclusive monthly tournaments, unique events, and reduced rates that enhance every game. Whether your goal is to refine your abilities, connect with other golf enthusiasts, or simply enjoy the course, our Players Club blends fellowship and spirited competition in a way that’s hard to match. Join the Eagle Glen family today and discover golfing at its very best! Contact Us Enjoy the golf experience Spectacular championship golf course with superb amenities and a stunning natural setting. One of the finest daily fee golf courses in Southern CA. Eagle Glen provides an extraordinary golf experience among golf courses Open to the public, the course was designed to naturally integrate the ancient oaks, majestic sycamores, towering eucalyptus trees Read More Premier Pickleball Facility in Corona Pickleball at Eagle Glen! A premier pickleball facility is set to open in our community, promising an exceptional experience for players of all levels. Designed and constructed by professional pickleball players, the facility will adhere to the highest standards of the sport, featuring tournament-grade courts that meet stringent regulations. Beyond the courts, the venue will offer a comprehensive range of amenities. Read More A Superb Corona Bar & Grille The Grille At Eagle Glen Eagle Glen’s Grille is a top-notch spot for a meal with friends or family, a cold drink in hand, or catching the big game in a place that feels polished yet easygoing—perfect for all ages. Inside, you’ve got this sharp Californian look that’s stylish but not over-the-top, a solid bar with all the options, and five TVs, including a big 55-inch one, set up so everyone gets a good view. Read More Celebrate Weddings Book Your Event, Weddings & Parties Eagle Glen Golf Clubhouse, overlooking emerald fairways and clear blue skies, is Corona premier upscale venue for most any type of event. BOOK YOUR EVENT BOOK YOUR TEE TIME Experience our 18-holes of great golf plus pay the best rate available when you book directly through our website. BOOK A TEE TIME Sim Lounge Corona's 
Premier Golf Simulator Experience cutting-edge technology with Eagle Glen’s immersive golf simulator. Play renowned courses, sharpen your skills, or compete with friends, all in a realistic, climate-controlled setting in Corona. Perfect for golfers of all levels, our simulator offers year-round enjoyment and a premier golfing experience. Book Sim Lounge See what Our Customers are Saying We have achieved the honor of being the highest-rated pool company on Yelp, with a remarkable 100 five-star reviews. Zemn A. 23/04/2025 I never imagined that I would have my “dream” wedding come to life in such a short amount of time. It went beyond my dreams. The location itself is absolutely mesmerizing. The hall is gorgeous and there is so much you can do! Raul and Madison are amazing! Anna C. 23/04/2025 Our Daughter and Son in law had their Wedding here 3 weeks ago. It was BEAUTIFUL to say the least, We had ZERO complaints. From the beginning, rehearsal dinner and Wedding Day, the whole Eagle Glen Team was Fabulous. Raul, Anissa, Paulie, Gina and can’t forget our Bartender Hugo. Jazzlyn 23/04/2025 Both were very helpful throughout our entire time preparing for the wedding. From the time we booked with Eagle Glen to the day of our wedding. Anissa was our coordinator andade sure that everything went according to plan and Kevin answered all questions and helped us with the sales and even assisted with our photographer and videographer. Cindy Rose Local Guide 23/04/2025 The facility was very clean. The staff was very helpful. Prices for the snacks and drinks are decent. The restrooms were clean. B. Smith 23/04/2025 This very scenic course was not too busy and in great condition recently, with flawless greens, sandy bunkers, and close-cut hybrid bermuda in the fairways.
